title: Account hacked?
body:
Someone else got on my account spent my rp and played 3 ranked games can i get a refund on all the rp they spent

I have already changed my password

replies.body:
If you submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), one of our account specialists can work with you to see what we can do to assist in this situation.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.
